Module main
Package com.vtuberrush.src.scenes

Class Playing

java.lang.Object
com.vtuberrush.src.scenes.GameScene
com.vtuberrush.src.scenes.Playing
All Implemented Interfaces:
SceneMethods
public class Playing extends GameScene implements SceneMethods
A playing game scene is a subclass of a game scene that facilitates the game loop.
Version:
0.0.1-alpha.1
Author:
Gio Carlo Ciudadano

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class com.vtuberrush.src.scenes.GameScene

    frame, frameDelay, game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Playing​(Game game)
    Creates a new playing game scene, attempts to load an existing game level, initializes a new instance of all game managers, and creates new buttons for upgrading and selling a displayed unit.

  • Constructor Details

    • Playing

      public Playing​(Game game)
      Creates a new playing game scene, attempts to load an existing game level, initializes a new instance of all game managers, and creates new buttons for upgrading and selling a displayed unit.
      Parameters:
      game - - The current instance of the game.

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Facilitates the spawning and pathfinding of new waves and enemies (WaveManager, EnemyManager); the creation, deletion, and targeting of all units (UnitManager); and the creation, deletion, and velocity of projectiles (ProjectileManager). Grants additional passive gold to the player in set intervals.

      For more information regarding the function of each game manager, please see the associated package and classes.

    • render

      public void render​(Graphics graphics)
      Description copied from interface: SceneMethods
      Draws all objects to the game screen.
      Specified by:
      render in interface SceneMethods
      Parameters:
      graphics - - Responsible for drawing objects to the screen.

    • shootEnemy

      public void shootEnemy​(Unit unit, Enemy enemy)
      Creates a projectile in the location of the passed unit, which travels to the passed enemy based on the unit's existing projectile speed.
      Parameters:
      unit - - The unit dealing damage. The amount of damage is dependent on the unit source.
      enemy - - The enemy receiving the damage.

    • blastEnemy

      public void blastEnemy​(Unit unit, Enemy enemy)
      Deals damage to the passed enemy that is near the passed unit.
      Called when a Petra unit spots an enemy within range.
      Parameters:
      unit - - The unit dealing damage. The amount of damage is dependent on the unit source.
      enemy - - The enemy receiving the damage.

    • addGold

      public void addGold​(int type)
      Adds gold to the user depending on the passed enemy type.
      Called when an enemy was killed.
      Parameters:
      type - - The enemy type that was killed.

    • subtractLives

      public void subtractLives​(int amount)
      Reduces the amount of lives of the player by the passed amount.
      Parameters:
      amount - - The amount of lives being subtracted. Dependent on the enemy type.

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
      Resets all game managers, selections, pauses, gold, and mouse coordinates.

    • mouseClicked

      public void mouseClicked​(int x, int y)

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      x - - Defines the horizontal position of the mouse from the left of the window in pixels.
      y - - Defines the vertical position of the mouse from the top of the window in pixels.

      public void keyPressed​(KeyEvent e)

      y - - Defines the vertical position of the unit from the top of the window in pixels.

    • setLevel

      public void setLevel​(int[][] level)
      Sets the playing field equal to the passed two-dimensional level format which was converted using MathFunctions from reading a level file in LoadSave.
      Parameters:
      level - - The converted level file format.

    • setSelectedUnit

      public void setSelectedUnit​(Unit selectedUnit)
      Modifies the currently selected unit to be the unit either clicked from the playing field or clicked from the associated unit button in the action bar.
      Parameters:
      selectedUnit - - The new unit that is selected.

    • setGamePaused

      public void setGamePaused​(boolean gamePaused)
      Pauses or unpauses the game.
      Parameters:
      gamePaused - - Defines whether the game is currently paused.
